name: The 6th International Conference on System Reliability and Safety Engineering
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted and presented papers will be published by \*SRSE conference proceedings\*. Published papers are expected to be included in \*IEEE Xplore\*, and indexed by\* EI Compendex, Scopus\* and other academical databases etc. Quality and Reliability Engineering International (QREI)--Special Issue: Advances and Novel Applications in Systems Reliability and Safety Engineering, IF: 3; Index: SCIE, EI Compendex, SCOPUS, etc.
organizers: Zhejiang University, National University of Singapore
